Hi,
I am Chenye Zou
Member of QINREN Team

I'm an undergraduate from Xi'an Jiao Tong University majored in Electrical Engineering. I am interested in the modeling of Li-ion battery and the prediction of it. Welcome to my webpage : )

Resume

Major Work

I am interested in Li-ion battery. Thanks to XIN and my parterner! My major works are as follows:

Modeling of Battery

Try to establish the model of Li-ion battery with COMSOL and use it to search for quick charge strategies.

State of Charge Prediction

Forecast Li-ion battery state of charge with time series prediction methods such as LSTM.

What's more?

Wait and see...

Related Work

The related work behind the major is introduced here.

Machine Learning Development Tools
Tensorflow and Keras

This post introduce the machine learning development tools we used, and how we applied them to the realistic applications, espacially my major work.

Research Details

Establishing the Model of Li-ion Battery
Comsol Multiphysics

A precise Li-ion battery model is important when we search for quick charge strategies. Comsol Multiphysics is a good tool for us to establish a battery model based on electrochemistry.

Research Details

Battery Running Data Simulation
Matlab, Simulink

This post brief the simulation model for electrical vehicles based on simulink and matlab.

Research Details

Project Details

The details and results will be shown here.

Model of Li-ion Battery

80%

“Keywords: Matlab, Simulink, Comsol Multiphysics"

  • Establish a model of electric vehicles with simulink
  • Use the model above to simulate and get some battery data
  • Build a model of Li-ion battery based on electrochemistry with Comsol

Battery State of Charge Estimation

60%

“Keywords: Multivariate time series prediction, State of charge, Simulink"

  • Build the SOC estimation model based on machine learning algorithm
  • Collect battery running simulation data in different circumstance
  • Consider voltage, current, temperature and so on

Search for quick charge strategies

30%

“Keywords: Comsol Multiphysics, Quick charge"

  • Search for different strategies
  • Consider temperature, current and so on
